record.name: Config
record.prop: The database URL to connect to on start.
The session key to sign sessions.
The URL of elastic search to log request data.
Default public vapid used for notifications.

Default private vapid used for notifications. Each origin can be assigned its own vapid keys since only a single service-worker from the same origin is allowed, so that if a website is using its own notification system, the keys can be reused.
